dcterms:description: The Office-Arts dataset is used for cross-domain recommendation tasks, specifically focusing on the Office and Arts domains in Amazon, where users' rating behaviors on products are recorded.

dcterms:description: The OnlineRetail-Pantry dataset is used for cross-domain recommendation tasks, focusing on the Pantry domain and data from OnlineRetail, where users' purchase histories are recorded.
